item.title: JavaScript Notes
item.description: Introduction Three pillars in web development HTML - Content - Nouns CSS - Style and layout - Adjectives JavaScript - The real programming language to build web applications - Verbs What applications that JavaScript can build? Front-end apps React, Angular, Vue, etc. Back-end apps Node.js Native mobile apps React Native, Ionic Native desktop apps Electron JavaScript is a multi-paradigm interpreted language Modern JavaScript uses just-in-time compilation (no portable files) JavaScript runtime
